Name: Percentage of SW-Checklist Completed out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Checklist Completed' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of SW-Checklist Completed across all cases
Percentage of variants that contain SW-Checklist Completed immediately after Plagiarism Originality Report Completed
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Checklist Completed' out of all 'Plagiarism Originality Report Completed'

Name: Frequency of SW-Checklist Completed followed by SW-Awaiting AE Assignment
Metric: Number of 'SW-Checklist Completed' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Checklist Completed that occur without a preceding SW-Checklist Completion is due in three days
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Checklist Completed' out of all cases where 'SW-Checklist Completion is due in three days' does not happen

Name: Ratio of SW-Checklist Completed to SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion occurrences
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Checklist Completed' out of all 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion'

Name: Percentage of cases where SW-Checklist Completed appears before any reviewer-related activity (e.g., SW-Reviewer Agreed, SW-Reviewer Declined)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Checklist Completed' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Frequency of SW-Checklist Completed in variants that eventually lead to SW-EIC Reject
Metric: Number of 'SW-Checklist Completed' activities for cases where activity 'SW-EIC Reject' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Checklist Completed activities that are part of the shortest common variant path ending in an editorial decision
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Checklist Completed' out of all 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Frequency of SW-Checklist Completed occurring after Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission
Metric: Number of 'SW-Checklist Completed' activities for cases where activity 'Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Checklist Completed that directly enable transition to reviewer assignment phase (i.e., followed by SW-Initial Reviewer Selection or SW-AE Assign Reviewers)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Checklist Completed' out of all 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection'

Name: Ratio of SW-Checklist Completed to Manuscript Export Succeeded occurrences
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Checklist Completed' out of all 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'

Name: Percentage of variants containing SW-Checklist Completed that include at least one reminder or deadline escalation activity (e.g., SW-Checklist Completion is due in three days, SW-Checklist Completion now due)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Checklist Completed' out of all 'SW-Checklist Completion is due in three days'

Name: Frequency of SW-Checklist Completed in cases that ultimately result in acceptance (e.g., ending with RW-EIC Accept or SW-EIC Accept)
Metric: Number of 'SW-Checklist Completed' activities for cases where activity 'SW-EIC Accept' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Checklist Completed executed by SYSTEM performer relative to total SW-Checklist Completed executions
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Checklist Completed' out of all cases
